unittitle_ssm: Rebecca Conkling Shelton correspondence with O.B. Ackerley
abstract_ssm: This collection contains correspondence between Rebecca Conkling Shelton and O.B. Ackerley concerning Shelton's late husband, the Reverend Frederick William Shelton, and the acquisition of a collection of his sermons.  The collection also includes a list of Frederick William Shelton's Works" and a eulogy.
collection_ssm: Rebecca Conkling Shelton correspondence with O.B. Ackerley
